701558f-a.text:
Orloff Avenue, north from Van Cortlandt Avenue West. The
thoroughfare was paved by the W.P.A.
January 27, 1937
W.P.A. Photo
Five Boroughs Project
701558f-a.folder: Orloff Avenue & Van Cortlandt Avenue (West), Bronx, NY
701558f-a.original_title: Bronx: Orloff Avenue - Van Cortlandt Avenue (West)

701963f-a.text:
Van Cortlandt Avenue West, north side, west of Orloff Avenue, showing an old 2-story framed dwelling. The maps of 1900 and 1911 show it to have been on the A. Van Cortlandt property. It now (1938) occupies lot 356 on block 3252-E.

May 6, 1938.

P. L. Speer.
701963f-a.folder: Van Cortlandt Avenue & Orloff Avenue, Bronx, NY
701963f-a.original_title: Bronx: Van Cortlandt Avenue - Orloff Avenue
